title: Cook Ease
description: The project involved designing and prototyping a recipe management app using Figma, focusing on dietary restrictions, budget management, and nutrition tracking, and conducting market research to identify user pain points.

title: Tech Support Pro
description: Implemented a 9-table relational database schema using Oracle Database 19c for ticketing system management. Created Entity-Relationship Diagram and optimized 3NF normalization for data integrity. Developed SQL queries for SLA compliance monitoring and performance tracking.

title: Xfinity SmartMatch
description: AI-powered product recommendation system for Xfinity users, built during Philly Codefest 2025.
